items.name: Basket Full of Wishes
items.description: Wishes do come true, by the basketful, actually. This delightful arrangement is so full of sunny blossoms, it even includes a pretty yellow butterfly who obviously feels right at home, basking in the warmth.
items.arrangement: Brilliant yellow spray roses, asiatic lilies, miniature gerberas, carnations, alstroemeria, button spray chrysanthemums and delightful greenery are joined by a delicate butterfly in an oval basket. It's a basket of wonder and wishes!

items.name: Haute Pink Bouquet
items.description: A high-fashion fantasy of roses! When you want to make a grand statement, send this dreamy bouquet of posh pink roses and modern greens.
items.arrangement: This gorgeous bouquet includes light pink hydrangea, hot pink roses, lavender roses, pink roses, hot pink spray roses, light pink spray roses, pink lisianthus, dusty miller, huckleberry, sword fern, seeded eucalyptus, lemon leaf, and variegated aspidistra leaves. Delivered in a large glass cylinder vase.

images.alt: Haute Pink Bouquet Bouquet
Haute Pink Bouquet Bouquet
Haute Pink Bouquet Bouquet

items.name: Queen's Court by Teleflora
items.description: When you really want to make a grand impression on someone special, choose this regal arrangement. Roses, in every possible shade of pink, are so beautifully arranged in an exclusive silver Mercury Glass Bowl, there's no doubt you'll be treated like royalty when you send it!
items.arrangement: Light, medium and hot pink roses and spray roses are hand-arranged with greens in a gorgeous Mercury Glass Bowl. It's perfectly majestic!

items.name: A Little Pink Me Up
items.description: Youthful. Graceful. Beautiful. These are just a few qualities that come to mind when gazing at a gorgeous bouquet of pink flowers. Whether you want this arrangement to say "Happy Anniversary" or "Happy Any Day," you can be sure the day it arrives will be brighter for anyone lucky enough to receive it.
items.arrangement: Lovely pink roses and asiatic lilies are joined by hot pink gerberas and miniature carnations, pink full-sized carnations and more in a clear glass ball. Send this one and life will be a bowl of cheer!

items.name: Forever Fuchsia Bouquet
items.description: Pretty in pink! A surprise they'll remember forever, this fantasy of fuchsia lilies, roses and carnations is artistically arranged in a sleek contemporary vase.
items.arrangement: This stunning bouquet features pink oriental lilies, hot pink roses, pink carnations, fuchsia stock, light pink spray roses, pink heather, lemon leaf, huckleberry, seeded eucalyptus, and a small green potted echeveria succulent. Delivered in a raspberry tapered vase.

Forever Fuchsia Bouquet Bouquet
Forever Fuchsia Bouquet Bouquet

items.name: Imagination Blooms with Cymbidium Orchids
items.description: This towering topiary of asiatic lilies, orchids and roses - artistically arranged with tropical greenery - is a unique gift that celebrates the spirit of creativity.
items.arrangement: Pink asiatic lilies rise up from a square design block holding a mix of cymbidium orchids, spray roses and accent blooms and greenery.

items.name: Teleflora's Sunny Mood Bouquet
items.description: An instant pick-me-up! Beautifully arranged in a stylish cube vase, these radiant roses and lilies deliver smiles and sunshine, any day of the week.
items.arrangement: This bright bouquet includes yellow roses, yellow asiatic lilies, green carnations, yellow button spray chrysanthemums, bupleurum and leatherleaf fern. Delivered in a glass cube.
